qas.question: How do Ismailis differ from Twelvers?
Who is the elder brother of Musa al-Kadhim?
Who is the father of Isma'il ibn Jafar?
What did Imam Ismail pass on to his son?

context: The Ismailis differ from Twelvers because they had <a0_0>living imams<a0_0/> for centuries after the last Twelver Imam went into concealment. They followed <a1_0>Isma'il ibn Jafar<a1_0/>, elder brother of Musa al-Kadhim, as the rightful Imam after his father <a2_0>Ja'far al-Sadiq<a2_0/>. The Ismailis believe that whether Imam Ismail did or did not die before Imam Ja'far, he had passed on the <a3_0>mantle of the imamate<a3_0/> to his son Muḥammad ibn Ismail as the next imam.
